data.title: Trying to clone a partition
data.meta_description:
I have replaced my windows SSD with a new empty SSD and now I would like to move Manjaro from SSD2 to SSD1. 
I have searched and found the best way of doing this is with Clonezilla. Howevere, Im not having much joy with …
data.text:
Hopefully Ive done it right this time
